short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TipThis.link is a Crowd Funding for Webpages based on the current URL where the Donation is given.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes you will find a good Article, good free Software or whatever good content in the internet. Some of this content provider have difficulties to continue their idea because of lacking financial support. With this donation function you can donate on any content in the internet with a minimum amount and minimum effort, just by one click. As soon there is a sufficient amount including others on a content or link we will setup a connection to the provider or producer and issue the donation amount. If we can not contact the provider or producer of this content within a time, we will credit the amount for your next donation.
